programme.title: Johnny English
Johnny English – Der Spion, der es versiebte
programme.desc:
Johnny English: Directed by Peter Howitt. With Rowan Atkinson, Tasha de Vasconcelos, Ben Miller, Greg Wise. After a sudden attack on MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident, yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0274166/","name":"Johnny English","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDkxODhlNmItYjhiMC00ZjNmLWE2YmMtOTQ3NmQxM2YzOGFiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"After a sudden attack on MI5, Johnny English, Britain's most confident, yet unintelligent spy, becomes Britain's only spy.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0274166/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"PlanecrazyIkarus"},"dateCreated":"2003-04-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Yet another movie that would have been better off without a trailer","reviewBody":"Johnny English starts off a little bit like Bean: For some reason, wildly constructed, Rowan Atkinson ends up in a position that is far beyond his capabilities. Where Bean turns from Museum Guard to Museum curator impersonator, Johnny English turns from male Monneypenny-alike mission planner to James Bond replacement.

Sort of.

In a Bean kind of way, of course. Now that is where comparison with Bean should stop: Johnny English talks, for one thing, and doesn't just gesticulate around like a bit of a moron. And while he still causes a lot of trouble and shines in his incompetence, he manages to be far more charming and far less annoying than Mr Bean is in a 90 minute movie. Expect lots of visual humour, but also the odd moment of funny dialogue (the "making love" dialogue scene is quite hilarious)

The plot is standard Bond fare: A French tycoon is up to no good, stealing crown jewels and trying to become king of.... England, oddly enough. There is a Bond girl, played by Natalie Imbruglia and sharing more similarities with Sophie Yeoh's butt-kicking bond girl than with the more traditional damsel in distress. But unfortunately, there is no equivalent to Q, nor to M and the movie is a bit too much of a one-man show.

How does it fare then? On the laughter front it was quite satisfying, easily outmanoeuvering the once-too-often repeated Austin Powers, putting anything recent by Leslie Nielsen to shame and being an altogether fine Bond spoof. There is lots of slapstick (including the disgusting kind), but the movie manages to be less over the top and closer to Bond than to old National Lampoon / Mel Brooks movies.

Altogether the movie was pleasantly surprising - better than Bean (which isn't too hard, to be honest) and Austin Powers (although it is a different kind of spoof). Still not brilliant, but a good dose of old-fashioned entertainment. Pity the trailer gave away quite a lot of the best bits.

Plus, the bad guy was supposedly French, what more could you ask for?"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":154097,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2003-05-28","keywords":"queen elizabeth ii character,slapstick comedy,looking at oneself in a mirror,character name as title,tied feet","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Johnny English","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1284702489","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjUwYmNkZmUtY2ZjMC00ZmM1LWEzMWMtNjE0NzY5NjI3OGI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjUwYmNkZmUtY2ZjMC00ZmM1LWEzMWMtNjE0NzY5NjI3OGI5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000100/","name":"Rowan Atkinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000518/","name":"John Malkovich"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001386/","name":"Natalie Imbruglia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0398185/","name":"Peter Howitt"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0057311/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701031/","name":"Neal Purvis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0905498/","name":"Robert Wade"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0204030/","name":"William Davies"}],"duration":"PT1H29M"}</script><metacontent="

Asterix und Obelix: Mission Kleopatra
programme.desc: Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre: Directed by Alain Chabat. With Gérard Depardieu, Christian Clavier, Jamel Debbouze, Monica Bellucci. Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250223/","name":"Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q3NmUzNjAtM2VjMS00MGU3LWE4YjEtZTM1NDM0YTdlOWRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250223/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"jvanhalderen"},"dateCreated":"2002-09-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"The French are getting the hang of it!!","reviewBody":"Wow! the French are really getting the hang of it. If we look at their first Asterix movie we see a good story with nice actors (especially thanks to Gerard Depardeu)but very lame special effect. In a fantasy story like Asterix Special Effects are really important. Well.. they did it right this time! It looks terrific. I personaly think Mission Cleopatra is the best Asterix story ever written. In the movie there's not one moment you're bored. Go and watch this! One thing! they didnt go exactly by the script which I think is a little bit pittyful. For example, In the comic Obelix breaks the nose of the Sphinx, immediatly all the little storekeepers start breaking of the nose of their miniature Sphinx. (really funny to see)..Well they didnt put it in the movie, instead they burried the nose under the Sphinx. Asterix: "They will never look for it here" (guess again). Was funny but not as good as the original. Another thing i disliked about the movie was their choice for music. It maked the film to childies. But never the less... It's a must C!\n\nGrz Da Jean Holland","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":50999,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2002-01-30","keywords":"architect,based on comic book,egypt,druid,cleopatra","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979890201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002010/","name":"Christian Clavier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049807/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331453/","name":"René Goscinny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879853/","name":"Albert Uderzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nanny McPhee
Eine zauberhafte Nanny
programme.desc:
Nanny McPhee: Directed by Kirk Jones. With Emma Thompson, Colin Firth, Kelly Macdonald, Thomas Brodie-Sangster. A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0396752/","name":"Nanny McPhee","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwNDUxODEwMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzgyMTIzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0396752/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1"},"dateCreated":"2007-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Extremely Colorful, A Fun Film Enchanced By Emma's Title Role","reviewBody":"This was a pleasant surprise, much better than I anticipated. I figured Emma Thompson would be good in the title role because you can usually count on her to be entertaining in form or another, cerebrally, emotionally or comically. What I didn't figure on was the fun, extremely colorful story, overall. This was like a banana split for your senses - all kinds of wild treats for the eyes and ears.....to taste, so to speak.

This film features outrageous color schemes from the word "go," from the interior of the "Brown's" house, to everyone's apparel to the scenery outside. It almost reminded me "The Cat In The Hat" with its crazy colors. 

All the characters are as exaggerated as the colors, too. The kids may be brats but they aren't bad once they get some needed discipline and love from Nanny McPhee. They are still fun to watch, and all are quite different in appearance and mannerisms. Thompson is a howl as Mary Poppins-like McPhee and so are the supporting characters. There were no sappy songs, either. This is not a musical.

The only character annoying to me was the kids' dad, played by Colin Firth. The actor was fine but his character was so wishy-washy, so wussy, he was barely tolerable for much of the film. By the way, you might not recognize the famous Angela Lansbury in here. Everyone, including her, must have had a great time filming this movie. 

Only the final wedding segment got carried away with juvenile silliness; the rest was fun for adults and well as the kids, who must have loved this all the way through.

This is simply good entertainment and highly recommended.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":72207,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2006-05-31","keywords":"nanny,widower,magic,family relationships,1800s","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"DVD Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1551810073","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM3OTU4NWEtNjgzMS00OGU3LWI1ZWEtMTY2MmQ0M2M1ZDc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM3OTU4NWEtNjgzMS00OGU3LWI1ZWEtMTY2MmQ0M2M1ZDc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001450/","name":"Angela Lansbury"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428600/","name":"Kirk Jones"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104447/","name":"Christianna Brand"}],"duration":"PT1H37M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: --- Actors: Emma Thompson (role=Nanny McPhee), Colin Firth (role=Mr. Brown), Kelly Macdonald (role=Evangeline), Thomas Brodie-Sangster (role=Simon), Eliza Bennett (role=Tora), Jennifer Rae Daykin (role=Lily), Raphaël Coleman (role=Eric), Samuel Honywood (role=Sebastian), Holly Gibbs (role=Christianna), Hebe Barnes (role=Baby Agatha), Zinnia Barnes (role=Baby Agatha), Angela Lansbury (role=Aunt Adelaide)

IMDb data; ttnr: 0396752, Title: Nanny McPhee, --- Description: Nanny McPhee: Directed by Kirk Jones. With Emma Thompson, Colin Firth, Kelly Macdonald, Thomas Brodie-Sangster. A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0396752/","name":"Nanny McPhee","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjAwNDUxODEwMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzgyMTIzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0396752/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ccthemovieman-1","dateCreated":"2007-08-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Extremely Colorful, A Fun Film Enchanced By Emma's Title Role","reviewBody":"This was a pleasant surprise, much better than I anticipated. I figured Emma Thompson would be good in the title role because you can usually count on her to be entertaining in form or another, cerebrally, emotionally or comically. What I didn't figure on was the fun, extremely colorful story, overall. This was like a banana split for your senses - all kinds of wild treats for the eyes and ears.....to taste, so to speak.

This film features outrageous color schemes from the word "go," from the interior of the "Brown's" house, to everyone's apparel to the scenery outside. It almost reminded me "The Cat In The Hat" with its crazy colors. 

All the characters are as exaggerated as the colors, too. The kids may be brats but they aren't bad once they get some needed discipline and love from Nanny McPhee. They are still fun to watch, and all are quite different in appearance and mannerisms. Thompson is a howl as Mary Poppins-like McPhee and so are the supporting characters. There were no sappy songs, either. This is not a musical.

The only character annoying to me was the kids' dad, played by Colin Firth. The actor was fine but his character was so wishy-washy, so wussy, he was barely tolerable for much of the film. By the way, you might not recognize the famous Angela Lansbury in here. Everyone, including her, must have had a great time filming this movie. 

Only the final wedding segment got carried away with juvenile silliness; the rest was fun for adults and well as the kids, who must have loved this all the way through.

This is simply good entertainment and highly recommended.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":72207,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2006-05-31","keywords":"nanny,widower,magic,family relationships,1800s","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"DVD Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1551810073","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM3OTU4NWEtNjgzMS00OGU3LWI1ZWEtMTY2MmQ0M2M1ZDc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzM3OTU4NWEtNjgzMS00OGU3LWI1ZWEtMTY2MmQ0M2M1ZDc0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A governess uses magic to rein in the behavior of seven ne'er-do-well children in her charge.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000147/","name":"Colin Firth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001450/","name":"Angela Lansbury"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0428600/","name":"Kirk Jones"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0047476/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000668/","name":"Emma Thompson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0104447/","name":"Christianna Brand"],"duration":"PT1H37M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang
Eine zauberhafte Nanny – Knall auf Fall in ein neues Abenteuer
programme.desc:
Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang: Directed by Susanna White. With Maggie Gyllenhaal, Oscar Steer, Asa Butterfield, Lil Woods. Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1415283/","name":"Nanny McPhee and the Big Bang","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTI5NDUxNDU4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk1NjM1Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1415283/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"sabertammama"},"dateCreated":"2010-03-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"One for all the family","reviewBody":"Not having seen Nanny McPhee 1, I wasn't sure what to expect, but I have to say I was very pleasantly surprised.

The film was very easy to get into and the story and plot were well written and set.

The actors young and old performed brilliantly making the whole thing enchanting and a highly believable fantasy.

The special effects were very well done and the comedy in it was delightful. I took my children with me, aged 5, 12, 15 and 18 and they all loved it too, with lots of laugh out loud moments and lots of smiles throughout.

All in all a very good film and I recommend it highly.

If you're going to see it I suggest you take all the family. Its a definite must see for all ages and you'll not be disappointed.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":30771,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Comedy","Family","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2010-06-02","keywords":"nanny,magic,farm,goat,elephant","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Nanny McPhee Returns: Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi823789337","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzUyNjIwOTEyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQwMTU0Mw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzUyNjIwOTEyNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMDQwMTU0Mw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Nanny McPhee arrives to help a harried young mother who is trying to run the family farm while her husband is away at war, though she uses her magic to teach the woman's children and their two spoiled cousins five new lessons. programme.title: The Witches of Eastwick
Die Hexen von Eastwick
programme.desc: The Witches of Eastwick: Directed by George Miller. With Jack Nicholson, Cher, Susan Sarandon, Michelle Pfeiffer. Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0094332/","name":"The Witches of Eastwick","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTA4ZGRlNDEtNDliMi00NmI0LThlYjctYmViMjI0MDlmOWU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three single women in a picturesque village have their wishes granted, at a cost, when a mysterious and flamboyant man arrives in their lives.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Quinoa1984"},"dateCreated":"2003-05-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"The songs Witchy Woman (women) meets Sympathy for the Devil, combined for a comic fantasy","reviewBody":"George Miller (Mad Max) creatively sets the stage for a story of three witches and one Lucifer, who are in regular human form, in a small, uptight New England town. Of course, for a tale like this one can try to suspend disbelief, and it has to be when dealing with the supernatural. Thankfully, Miller has great casting tastes- Cher, Sarandon, and Pfieffer are wonderful in their roles, each with an acute, potent sexuality that was at their peaks in the late 80's. And then there's Mr shark grin himself, Jack Nicholson, who gives another superb layer to the performance of the dark prince. There are other actors who have portrayed the man downstairs- Al Pacino in Devil's Advocate was the devil as lawyer, Billy Crystal was himself in the Woody/Dante sequence in Deconstructing Harry, even Elizabeth Hurley in Bedazzled. \n\nBut rarely have they had this much outright fun and charm with the role, enough to almost make me, a man in his 20s, charmed too. Maybe it's the eyebrows. Nicholson gives one of his best over-the-top performances as the "horny-little devil" Darryl, who comes into town during a storm and cooks up more than that for his avid female guests. Of course, he doesn't have control for long, when the girls find they have powers of their own. When the movie gets overly fantastic (which is a number of times) it gets a little hard to take, yet the acting is above par, and the special effects are a delight.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":66194,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Fantasy","Horror"],"datePublished":"1987-06-12","keywords":"divorced woman,windstorm,verbose speech,1980s,hand on woman's butt","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"The Witches of Eastwick","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2046165273","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWYzMmFiZDItMTRkYS00ZDZhLTljZDAtZTI4M2Y3NDJlMjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOWYzMmFiZDItMTRkYS00ZDZhLTljZDAtZTI4M2Y3NDJlMjBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Warner Bros. Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000197/","name":"Jack Nicholson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000333/","name":"Cher"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000215/","name":"Susan Sarandon"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004306/","name":"George Miller"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108873/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0066464/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0881433/","name":"John Updike"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0188165/","name":"Michael Cristofer"}],"duration":"PT1H58M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: De l'autre côté du lit
Auf der anderen Seite des Bettes
programme.desc: De l'autre côté du lit: Directed by Pascale Pouzadoux. With Sophie Marceau, Dany Boon, Antoine Duléry, Roland Giraud. To save their marriage, a man and a woman decide to exchange their lives for a year." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1275590/","name":"De l'autre côté du lit","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGEwNTE3MzUtOWNmOS00N2Q2LWI2MDAtZGNhODI3NDM4N2U3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzQzNzQxNzI@._V1_.jpg","description":"To save their marriage, a man and a woman decide to exchange their lives for a year.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1275590/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"aleena_m"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-01","inLanguage":"English","name":"Take it for what it is","reviewBody":"Before deciding if I want to see a movie or not, I usually do 2 things: I check out the IMDb vote and I see the trailer. To tell you the truth I did this quite a long time ago for this one, so I looked at the vote again before hitting the play button. You can imagine that my expectations were quite low: a 5.2 out of 10 isn't that much and the 3 reviews out there were so critical. I decided to see it anyway imagining that I will at least have a different experience given that the movies I normally watch are Hollywood productions. I must say I actually enjoyed it! I took it as a comedy, not as a documentary! I saw people were complaining about the fact that the situations were highly unlikely or that the movie was inspired from a book and it didn't do it justice. Well movies rarely succeed in doing that as far as I know... Books and movies are 2 distinct experiences! I liked the fact that there was little or no vulgarity and a complete lack of fart/bodily fluids/coarse sex jokes that I see too often! I don't find those funny! It's way more difficult to make people laugh because of funny circumstances or truly intelligent or sarcastic lines! To wrap it up without giving anything away, take it as a light-hearted comedy and don't have too high expectations - you might actually enjoy it ;)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":2584,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"genre":["Comedy"],"datePublished":"2009-01-07","keywords":"role reversal,switched identity,f rated,singing in a car,family relationships","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000521/","name":"Sophie Marceau"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0200702/","name":"Dany Boon"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0241383/","name":"Antoine Duléry"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0693903/","name":"Pascale Pouzadoux"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0233587/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0079764/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0257823/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3248435/","name":"Alix Girod de l'Ain"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0693903/","name":"Pascale Pouzadoux"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0897065/","name":"Grégoire Vigneron"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Ghostbusters
Ghostbusters – Die Geisterjäger
programme.desc:
Ghostbusters: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087332/","name":"Ghostbusters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjYyNzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3MjYyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087332/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ivo-cobra8"},"dateCreated":"2015-12-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Classic, original, best supernatural comedy's masterpiece!","reviewBody":"This movie is what it is, a perfect 10, because it takes the vision of one of the most imaginative directors on Earth, and realizes them almost perfectly with all the tools that fit the task -- actors, stunts, puppetry, models, and CGI.

Ghostbusters (1984) is the best classic original spectacular supernatural masterpiece from Ivan Reitman! One of if not the greatest films ever! My favorite film of all time! "Ghostbusters" is the film that made me become a fan ever since I was young! It had an awesome cast, cool special effects, hilarious dialogue and a kick-ass soundtrack! The film that can be watched over and over again! I grew up watching Ghostbusters on TV and the animated TV series The Real Ghostbusters (1986 - 1991). Ghostbusters II (1989) actually introduced me in to Ghostbusters. I loved them so much that I even said to my mom, when I grown up I will be a Ghostbuster! It was my fantasy. Watching it yesterday and I still love it. I love this flick to death! I still can't believe it how the world changed and how in the 80's the world was better than today! I always have enjoyed the sequel much better than as a child, it was my first movie but now as an adult, I love and enjoy the original movie to death! It is the only movie I own on Blu-ray disc and I still love it. 

This is an amazing movie! Funny, smart, well written and directed. It features an outstanding performance from Bill Murray, great showings by Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis and one of the last documented instances of Dan Aykroyd being funny on film (he was blown by a ghost!). In fact, the film gets a great performances from nearly everyone who appears in it- from Annie Potts, to the guy who played Lenny the Mayor, to the handsome cab driver who calls Rick Moranis an asshole. In addition, they had one of the best "a-hole" guys ever to appear on film, as the film's bad guy- I'm talking of course of the grossly under-rated William Atherton- who played the EPA guy, "Dickless". Atherton, of course went on to play memorable a-holes in Real Genius and of course he was the annoying reporter in Die Hard (1988) but here in Ghostbusters, you really see a solid performance by maybe the best guy to play an a-hole in films in the 80's. 

Next Year the reboot is coming out as Paul Feig's Ghostsnuters, Ghostbitches or Ghostflufers./: Ghostbusters (2016) with women now as a Ghostbusters! Why rebooting this awesome supernatural spectacular comedy flick? I know the sequel failed and Bill Murray did not want anything to do with it. But that doesn't mean that they shouldn't have made Ghostbusters III in the 90's, they should have! Dan Aykroyd and Harold Ramis tried so hard to convince Bill Murray to do it for the third sequel and they couldn't convinced him. They are going to ruin the Original movie! I don't want to see Ghostbusters with a female leads. Come on? The girls are not the Ghostbusters, they are three man a scientists and a one civilian. The Ghostbusters are the only one Harold Ramis, Dan Aykroyd, Ernie Hudson and Bill Murray. They were always be the Ghostbusters that will be the case. No one else will be! No one else will replace them! This is like A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) that come out the same year as the Ghostbusters did, they remake it and that remake failed!! It was awful boring! Why remaking or rebooting my classic horror comedy's that I Love?! Ghostbusters (1984) are unique, classic 80's masterpiece! These were the best times for movies ever!!! One of my favorite soundtracks and movie of all time!

They just don't make them like this anymore. This is comedic writing and performance at its peak... with quotes that everyone knows and enjoys. From "This reminds me of the time you tried to drill a hole in your head" to "Symmetrical book stacking. Just like the Philadelphia mass turbulence of 1947" to "Many Shuvs and Zuuls knew what it was to be roasted in the depths of the Slor that day, I can tell you! " this is a CLASSIC movie! Ghostbusters is a true classic comedy that stands the test of time. The film is funny, awesome and entertaining. It has a lot of laughs. I love the soundtrack Ghostbusters Written and Performed by Ray Parker Jr. I think he did made a great soundtrack in the 80's. If there's something strange in your neighborhood, who you gonna call? GHOSTBUSTERS!!!! A film that can be watched with the various youngest to the very oldest of the family. Wonderful collection of characters. A film that is treasured by just about everyone that watches it. I miss movies from the 80's and this film felt so realistic. Sigourney Weaver was just so outstanding as Dana Barrett after she made the horror flick Alien (1979 and Aliens (1986).

IMDb data; ttnr: 0087332, Title: Ghostbusters, --- Description: Ghostbusters: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0087332/","name":"Ghostbusters","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMjYyNzgwMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE3MjYyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0087332/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"ivo-cobra8","dateCreated":"2015-12-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Classic, original, best supernatural comedy's masterpiece!","reviewBody":"This movie is what it is, a perfect 10, because it takes the vision of one of the most imaginative directors on Earth, and realizes them almost perfectly with all the tools that fit the task -- actors, stunts, puppetry, models, and CGI.

Ghostbusters (1984) is the best classic original spectacular supernatural masterpiece from Ivan Reitman! One of if not the greatest films ever! My favorite film of all time! "Ghostbusters" is the film that made me become a fan ever since I was young! It had an awesome cast, cool special effects, hilarious dialogue and a kick-ass soundtrack! The film that can be watched over and over again! I grew up watching Ghostbusters on TV and the animated TV series The Real Ghostbusters (1986 - 1991). Ghostbusters II (1989) actually introduced me in to Ghostbusters. I loved them so much that I even said to my mom, when I grown up I will be a Ghostbuster! It was my fantasy. Watching it yesterday and I still love it. I love this flick to death! I still can't believe it how the world changed and how in the 80's the world was better than today! I always have enjoyed the sequel much better than as a child, it was my first movie but now as an adult, I love and enjoy the original movie to death! It is the only movie I own on Blu-ray disc and I still love it. 

This is an amazing movie! Funny, smart, well written and directed. It features an outstanding performance from Bill Murray, great showings by Harold Ramis, Rick Moranis and one of the last documented instances of Dan Aykroyd being funny on film (he was blown by a ghost!). In fact, the film gets a great performances from nearly everyone who appears in it- from Annie Potts, to the guy who played Lenny the Mayor, to the handsome cab driver who calls Rick Moranis an asshole. In addition, they had one of the best "a-hole" guys ever to appear on film, as the film's bad guy- I'm talking of course of the grossly under-rated William Atherton- who played the EPA guy, "Dickless". Atherton, of course went on to play memorable a-holes in Real Genius and of course he was the annoying reporter in Die Hard (1988) but here in Ghostbusters, you really see a solid performance by maybe the best guy to play an a-hole in films in the 80's. 

Next Year the reboot is coming out as Paul Feig's Ghostsnuters, Ghostbitches or Ghostflufers./: Ghostbusters (2016) with women now as a Ghostbusters! Why rebooting this awesome supernatural spectacular comedy flick? I know the sequel failed and Bill Murray did not want anything to do with it. But that doesn't mean that they shouldn't have made Ghostbusters III in the 90's, they should have! Dan Aykroyd and Harold Ramis tried so hard to convince Bill Murray to do it for the third sequel and they couldn't convinced him. They are going to ruin the Original movie! I don't want to see Ghostbusters with a female leads. Come on? The girls are not the Ghostbusters, they are three man a scientists and a one civilian. The Ghostbusters are the only one Harold Ramis, Dan Aykroyd, Ernie Hudson and Bill Murray. They were always be the Ghostbusters that will be the case. No one else will be! No one else will replace them! This is like A Nightmare on Elm Street (1984) that come out the same year as the Ghostbusters did, they remake it and that remake failed!! It was awful boring! Why remaking or rebooting my classic horror comedy's that I Love?! Ghostbusters (1984) are unique, classic 80's masterpiece! These were the best times for movies ever!!! One of my favorite soundtracks and movie of all time!

They just don't make them like this anymore. This is comedic writing and performance at its peak... with quotes that everyone knows and enjoys. From "This reminds me of the time you tried to drill a hole in your head" to "Symmetrical book stacking. Just like the Philadelphia mass turbulence of 1947" to "Many Shuvs and Zuuls knew what it was to be roasted in the depths of the Slor that day, I can tell you! " this is a CLASSIC movie! Ghostbusters is a true classic comedy that stands the test of time. The film is funny, awesome and entertaining. It has a lot of laughs. I love the soundtrack Ghostbusters Written and Performed by Ray Parker Jr. I think he did made a great soundtrack in the 80's. If there's something strange in your neighborhood, who you gonna call? GHOSTBUSTERS!!!! A film that can be watched with the various youngest to the very oldest of the family. Wonderful collection of characters. A film that is treasured by just about everyone that watches it. I miss movies from the 80's and this film felt so realistic. Sigourney Weaver was just so outstanding as Dana Barrett after she made the horror flick Alien (1979 and Aliens (1986).

programme.title: Ghostbusters II
Ghostbusters 2
programme.desc: Ghostbusters II: Directed by Ivan Reitman. With Bill Murray, Dan Aykroyd, Sigourney Weaver, Harold Ramis. The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0097428/","name":"Ghostbusters II","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ2NTk4MjE5Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODIwNjYxMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0097428/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Quinoa1984"},"dateCreated":"2000-10-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"This film shouldn't be panned","reviewBody":"I say that one line summary not in the meaning you should watch this film in widescreen, but in that this film isn't as bad as some people say. Sure it might not have the ultimate originality of the 1st (of course), but it is still entertaining, one of the best of 1989. This time, we see 5 years later where the Ghostbusters parted ways (Venkman to a Talk show, Spengler to a child psychologist and Stanz as a book store owner) but are put back together because of new activity in the paranormal that could end the world (courtesy of a painting named Vigo). Then, comedy ensues with great visual effects to match. Still pretty funny (the talk show scene with Chloe Webb is utterly hilarious), but maybe just a tad lesser than the first. A-","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":190914,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"1989-06-16","keywords":"ghost,new york city,ghostbuster,baby,slime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Ghostbusters II","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2401943065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMWUxOTJiOWEtZDY3Yi00MTMzLTk2NWItOWUxNGU4MzJmNWQ4XkEyXkFqcGdeQVRoaXJkUGFydHlJbmdlc3Rpb25Xb3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Official Trailer 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000195/","name":"Bill Murray"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000244/","name":"Sigourney Weaver"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000101/","name":"Dan Aykroyd"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000601/","name":"Harold Ramis"}],"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0465624/","name":"My Super Ex-Girlfriend","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTc4OTA4OTYyMl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzU4NDQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a regular guy dumps a superhero for her neediness, she uses her powers to make his life a living hell.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0465624/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"LazySod"},"dateCreated":"2006-10-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"No masterpiece, but still worthy of cinema","reviewBody":"A guy desperate for action attempts to hit on a gorgeous girl in a bus. She refuses him, but when he runs after someone who tries to steal her purse they get together anyway. And there it starts - a relation that is slightly tainted by the fact that she is a jealous and neurotic superhero. It can't be a secret that things between them are going to be problematic.

In short, a story that could promise to grow out into a cool film. And IMO, it succeeds at being a nice film. It's no masterpiece, but it had me in tears from laughing on more than one occasion - the two lead characters twirl around each other in a crazy love fest that is, even with the superhero thing going, believable.

So. Thin story, but worked out really funny and thus worthy of cinema time.

7 out of 10 broken hearts","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":63280,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Comedy","Romance","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2006-11-08","keywords":"superhero,supernatural power,superhero spoof,femme fatale,architect","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"My Super Ex-Girlfriend","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1419247897","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE5ZThkMTYtZjc2MS00Y2VkLTgxODEtNWRkZWU2NTcwNGRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTE5ZThkMTYtZjc2MS00Y2VkLTgxODEtNWRkZWU2NTcwNGRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000235/","name":"Uma Thurman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005561/","name":"Luke Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0267506/","name":"Anna Faris"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0718645/","name":"Ivan Reitman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0668309/","name":"Don Payne"}],"duration":"PT1H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Grimsby
Der Spion und sein Bruder
programme.desc: Grimsby: Directed by Louis Leterrier. With Sacha Baron Cohen, Rebel Wilson, Freddie Crowder, Jon-Jon Lockwood. A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3381008/","name":"Grimsby","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE0NTE3MjMwNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDc5NjQxODE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A new assignment forces a top spy to team up with his football hooligan brother.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3381008/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"SnoopyStyle"},"dateCreated":"2017-12-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"mix bag of outrageous humor","reviewBody":"Nobby Butcher (Sacha Baron Cohen) is an idiot football hooligan from Grimsby and has 11 children with Dawn (Rebel Wilson). He is looking to reconnect with estranged brother Sebastian Graves (Mark Strong). Sebastian is now a gunman for an MI6 offshoot. His investigation leads to actress philanthropist Rhonda George (Penelope Cruz). Nobby's interference causes Sebastian to be blamed for an assassination. Sebastian is forced to team up with his secret brother Nobby.\n\nNobby is partially annoying. Once I get over it, his idiocy is a little funny. It's all silly and outrageous. I'm half rolling my eyes, and half smirking in disbelief. I'm bored with the poop jokes and the more obvious stuff. The shock humor is over the top. On the other hand, SBC often hits the audience with some unexpected humor. It's a real mix bag.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":97868,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2016-02-24","keywords":"gay joke,bare breasts,public nudity,sex in public,water hose","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. Trailer #1","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3359027737","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1MzMyNDAyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMyNjU0NzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk1MzMyNDAyOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzMyNjU0NzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"When Sebastian Graves, a deadly MI6 agent, takes on a mission to prevent a massive global terror attack, he must unfortunately reunite with his long-lost brother Nobby, a sweet but dimwitted English football hooligan ... proving that behind every great spy is an embarrassing sibling."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0056187/","name":"Sacha Baron Cohen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0835016/","name":"Mark Strong"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2313103/","name":"Rebel Wilson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0504642/","name":"Louis Leterrier"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0255853/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0131363/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0056187/","name":"Sacha Baron Cohen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1601882/","name":"Phil Johnston"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0063165/","name":"Peter Baynham"}],"duration":"PT1H23M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: RV
Die Chaoscamper
programme.desc: RV: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld. With Robin Williams, Cheryl Hines, JoJo, Josh Hutcherson. Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0449089/","name":"RV","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDgxNDE2NDU3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA2ODQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0449089/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pfdoiron"},"dateCreated":"2006-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not great but good enough","reviewBody":"Robin Williams was on sedatives for most of this one, but I think he was trying hard to be the semi-happily married businessman has was casted to be. The kids were just a little over the top but accurate enough examples of their generation. There were great slapstick scenes and some decent toilet humor that owners and renters of RVs can relate to more than others. Avoiding the sweet as pie family was very funny. The way they destroyed the RV at every turn, made me think a little too much about how Robin was going to pay for it especially since he loses his job at the end, but wait!! the little Ben and jerry type owners save the day.\n\nThis one was definitely a renter quality not a lets go see a movie quality film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":58312,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2006-05-31","keywords":"road trip,vacation,family vacation,family business,homeschooling","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"RV","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1602552089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTVlMjQ4ZjItMDBmZC00NzA4LWEyMGQtMzM3NGJiZWMxYWUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTVlMjQ4ZjItMDBmZC00NzA4LWEyMGQtMzM3NGJiZWMxYWUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0385644/","name":"Cheryl Hines"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155693/","name":"Kristin Chenoweth"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001756/","name":"Barry Sonnenfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734900/","name":"Geoff Rodkey"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Save Yourselves
Save Yourselves!
programme.desc:
Save Yourselves!: Directed by Alex Huston Fischer, Eleanor Wilson. With Sunita Mani, John Reynolds, Ben Sinclair, John Early. A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7873348/","name":"Save Yourselves!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZhYzkwMzQtOWMyZi00NTJmLWFjNGEtYzAzNzJhNDZhMmQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDY2MjcyOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7873348/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"paul-allaer"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"When the world goes poof!","reviewBody":""Save Yourselves!" (2020 release; 93 min.) brings the story of John and Sue, a couple in Brooklyn. As the movie opens, they are bickering about computer and smart phone time. After attending a party where a friend offers his renovated updated cabin for free for a week, John and Sue eagerly take up the offer, and furthermore, they decide to disconnect from their phones and computers... At this point we are 10 min. into the film but to tell you more of the plot would spoil your viewing experience, you'll just have to see for yourself how it all plays out.

Couple of comments: this small-budget indie movie was written and directed by Alex Huston Fischer and Eleanor Wilson, this being their feature length debut. The story is the umpteenth reimagination of what "the end of the world" might look like, but they bring it with an original twist that I will not give away. Watch the film and the title of my review will make all the sense in the world. Sunita Mani (as Sue) and John Reynolds (as Jack), best known for their respective TV work, are enjoyable in the lead roles. They are in just about every frame of the film, and for long stretches it's just them. This film is billed as a scifi comedy, and I suppose it is. But I must be honest: rarely laughed (and certainly not out loud). The film lacks gravitas to be taken seriously, but it also lacks truly funny moments to work as a comedy. Instead what we get is an off-center indie film that is more quirky than anything else.

"Save Yourselves!" opened this weekend at my local art-house theater here in Cincinnati, of course fully adhering to all COVID-19 social distancing and other protocols. Not that it matter much, as the Friday early evening screening where I saw this at was attended poorly: exactly 3 people (including myself) in the theater's largest room. I honestly don't know how this and other theaters can keep operating like this on a profitable basis. IMDb data; ttnr: 7873348, Title: Save Yourselves, --- Description: Save Yourselves!: Directed by Alex Huston Fischer, Eleanor Wilson. With Sunita Mani, John Reynolds, Ben Sinclair, John Early. A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt7873348/","name":"Save Yourselves!","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjZhYzkwMzQtOWMyZi00NTJmLWFjNGEtYzAzNzJhNDZhMmQ2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDY2MjcyOTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young Brooklyn couple heads to an upstate cabin to unplug from their phones and reconnect with each other. Blissfully unaware of their surroundings, they are left to their own devices as the planet falls under attack.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7873348/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"paul-allaer","dateCreated":"2020-10-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"When the world goes poof!","reviewBody":""Save Yourselves!" (2020 release; 93 min.) brings the story of John and Sue, a couple in Brooklyn. As the movie opens, they are bickering about computer and smart phone time. After attending a party where a friend offers his renovated updated cabin for free for a week, John and Sue eagerly take up the offer, and furthermore, they decide to disconnect from their phones and computers... At this point we are 10 min. into the film but to tell you more of the plot would spoil your viewing experience, you'll just have to see for yourself how it all plays out.

Couple of comments: this small-budget indie movie was written and directed by Alex Huston Fischer and Eleanor Wilson, this being their feature length debut. The story is the umpteenth reimagination of what "the end of the world" might look like, but they bring it with an original twist that I will not give away. Watch the film and the title of my review will make all the sense in the world. Sunita Mani (as Sue) and John Reynolds (as Jack), best known for their respective TV work, are enjoyable in the lead roles. They are in just about every frame of the film, and for long stretches it's just them. This film is billed as a scifi comedy, and I suppose it is. But I must be honest: rarely laughed (and certainly not out loud). The film lacks gravitas to be taken seriously, but it also lacks truly funny moments to work as a comedy. Instead what we get is an off-center indie film that is more quirky than anything else.

"Save Yourselves!" opened this weekend at my local art-house theater here in Cincinnati, of course fully adhering to all COVID-19 social distancing and other protocols. Not that it matter much, as the Friday early evening screening where I saw this at was attended poorly: exactly 3 people (including myself) in the theater's largest room. I honestly don't know how this and other theaters can keep operating like this on a profitable basis. Meanwhile, if you have any interest in an atypical "end of the world" scifi comedy, I'd readily suggest you check this out , be it in the theater, on VOD, or eventually on DVD/Blu-ray, and draw your own conclusion.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6042,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7,"contentRating":"R","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2020-10-02","keywords":"couple,cabin,cell phone,woods,planet earth","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Sci-Fi Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi447594777","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmZmY2VlMjEtOTI5OS00MDUxLTgwODItNTY4NjY3ZmQ5NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmZmY2VlMjEtOTI5OS00MDUxLTgwODItNTY4NjY3ZmQ5NDAzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4576371/","name":"Sunita Mani","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm6324745/","name":"John Reynolds","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm4161154/","name":"Ben Sinclair"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7742589/","name":"Alex Huston Fischer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2856727/","name":"Eleanor Wilson"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0392734/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0724160/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0092503/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm7742589/","name":"Alex Huston Fischer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2856727/","name":"Eleanor Wilson"],"duration":"PT1H33M"</script><metacontent="

A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119654/","name":"Men in Black","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTlhYTVkMDktYzIyNC00NzlkLTlmN2ItOGEyMWQ4OTA2NDdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTAyODkwOQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119654/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"drevil1985"},"dateCreated":"2005-05-07","inLanguage":"English","name":"A great fantasy-comedy","reviewBody":"I am very upset that most people take this movie too seriously This movie is just a nice comedy with a very intriguing subject. Most people try to find bug in this movie but i believe that they should just sit back and enjoy the great epic line. Let's be serious do you believe that a galaxy can be carried around a cat's belt or that "Elivs is not dead he's just gone home" ? For this reason I believe this is an excellent comedy with a Sf theme. I also appreciate that the acting is very good and the script is very nicely written. I urge people to stop taking the "noisy cricket" too serious! This movie is making fun of the people who take this sort of things too seriously.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":537705,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1997-07-02","keywords":"alien,pantyhose,superhero,flying saucer,laser gun","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Version","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1466737177","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg1MDQ2MzU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ0ODkyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg1MDQ2MzU2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzQ0ODkyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A streetwise NYPD detective joins a secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000169/","name":"Tommy Lee Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000400/","name":"Linda Fiorentino"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001756/","name":"Barry Sonnenfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0108321/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192384/","name":"Lowell Cunningham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004412/","name":"Ed Solomon"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Men in Black 3
Men in Black 3
programme.desc:
Men in Black 3: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld. With Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Josh Brolin, Jemaine Clement. Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1409024/","name":"Men in Black 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2NTYxODcwMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk1NDY0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1409024/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho"},"dateCreated":"2012-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Adventure","reviewBody":"The criminal Boris the Animal (Jemaine Clement) escapes from the LunaMax, a moon-based maximum security prison. He comes to Earth seeking revenge from Agent K (Tommy Lee Jones) that has blown his arm up and arrested him forty years ago and protected Earth from a Boglodyte invasion. Boris is defeated again and he travels back in time to 1969 to kill Agent K.

When Agent J (Will Smith) notes that the time line has changed in the present days and Agent O (Emma Thompson) tells him that K died in 1969, he decides to travel to 15 July 1969 to save K on the next day. Agent J has difficulties to convince the Young Agent K (Josh Brolin) with lies, but when he decides to tell the truth, K believes in his words and they seek out Boris together. 

They are helped by the amicable alien Griiffin (Michael Stuhlbarg) that has precognitive powers and gives the ArcNet to K to protect Earth from the Boglodyte invasion. Further, J learns a secret about K and himself.

"Men in Black 3" is a great adventure of this franchise, with a wonderful story and magnificent special effects. I had low expectations with movie, but I was favorably surprised with an adorable film. My vote is seven. 

Title (Brazil): "MIB³ - Homens de Preto 3" ("MIB³ - Men in Black 3")","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":347172,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2012-05-25","keywords":"escape from prison,neil armstrong character,alien,time travel,cape canaveral florida","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3916407065","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzIzNzE5MjU5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ5NTEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzIzNzE5MjU5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ5NTEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent J time-jumps back to the year 1969 to take out an alien with its sights on the younger version of Agent K -- a situation that poses a threat to the future of the MIB organization, and humankind's very existence."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000169/","name":"Tommy Lee Jones"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000982/","name":"Josh Brolin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001756/","name":"Barry Sonnenfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316575/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1000113/","name":"Etan Cohen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192384/","name":"Lowell Cunningham"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

IMDb data; ttnr: 1409024, Title: Men in Black 3, --- Description: Men in Black 3: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld. With Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Josh Brolin, Jemaine Clement. Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1409024/","name":"Men in Black 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTU2NTYxODcwMF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNDk1NDY0Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent J travels in time to M.I.B.'s early days in 1969 to stop an alien from assassinating his friend Agent K and changing history.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1409024/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"claudio_carvalho","dateCreated":"2012-09-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Great Adventure","reviewBody":"The criminal Boris the Animal (Jemaine Clement) escapes from the LunaMax, a moon-based maximum security prison. He comes to Earth seeking revenge from Agent K (Tommy Lee Jones) that has blown his arm up and arrested him forty years ago and protected Earth from a Boglodyte invasion. Boris is defeated again and he travels back in time to 1969 to kill Agent K.

When Agent J (Will Smith) notes that the time line has changed in the present days and Agent O (Emma Thompson) tells him that K died in 1969, he decides to travel to 15 July 1969 to save K on the next day. Agent J has difficulties to convince the Young Agent K (Josh Brolin) with lies, but when he decides to tell the truth, K believes in his words and they seek out Boris together. 

They are helped by the amicable alien Griiffin (Michael Stuhlbarg) that has precognitive powers and gives the ArcNet to K to protect Earth from the Boglodyte invasion. Further, J learns a secret about K and himself.

"Men in Black 3" is a great adventure of this franchise, with a wonderful story and magnificent special effects. I had low expectations with movie, but I was favorably surprised with an adorable film. My vote is seven. 

Title (Brazil): "MIB³ - Homens de Preto 3" ("MIB³ - Men in Black 3")","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":347172,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8,"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2012-05-25","keywords":"escape from prison,neil armstrong character,alien,time travel,cape canaveral florida","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3916407065","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzIzNzE5MjU5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ5NTEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzIzNzE5MjU5N15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjQ5NTEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Agent J time-jumps back to the year 1969 to take out an alien with its sights on the younger version of Agent K -- a situation that poses a threat to the future of the MIB organization, and humankind's very existence.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000169/","name":"Tommy Lee Jones","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000982/","name":"Josh Brolin"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001756/","name":"Barry Sonnenfeld"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0316575/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1000113/","name":"Etan Cohen","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0192384/","name":"Lowell Cunningham"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: War on Everyone
Dirty Cops – War on Everyone
programme.desc:
War on Everyone: Directed by John Michael McDonagh. With Alexander Skarsgård, Michael Peña, Theo James, Tessa Thompson. Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt3708886/","name":"War on Everyone","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTU2MjAxMjk3Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjM5NzI5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two corrupt cops set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Events, however, are complicated by the arrival of someone who appears to be even more dangerous than they are.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt3708886/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nanstamps"},"dateCreated":"2017-02-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"A weird modern tribute/homage/caricature of 70's cop fiction","reviewBody":"I really liked War On Everyone, to me it was an alternate reality made through the trope of American cop movies and TV from the 70's. Not the real 70's but the film fiction of the 1970's but with the movie actually set in modern times.

I also noticed the viewer has to pay attention or you will miss the connection of each scene to the next (no checking your cell phone). War On Everyone is a tightly woven film where a homage to 70's film/TV style might be too obscure for anyone under 50 or someone who never watched old 70's cop stuff. The movie probably needed some objective editing from someone besides the writer/director.

I'm 54 and I thought War On Everyone was very funny. :-) I have a tomboy mom who took me to every car chase movie that came out in the 70's - R rated included - and her favorite TV shows (that me and my brother were 'forced' to watch) were Mannix, Dragnet, and Adam 12. I loved Starsky and Hutch 1975 (Huggy Bear reference in WOE). It probably helped me like the movie.

The movie does not pull it's punches in swearing, offensive racial slurs, and bawdy humor but it strangely passes the Bechdel test when the two main female characters have a scene where they talk to each other about their travels.

War On Everyone is movie where everyone has their faults but seems to ask the questions, "Does societies definition of right and wrong mean anything, are there acceptable degrees of wrongness and is there a line that even "bad" people won't cross?"","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17876,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.9},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2016-10-07","keywords":"hare krishna,dirty cop,corrupt police,albuquerque new mexico,police detective","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1613936153","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNzU2OTQyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE4NDE5MDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUxNzU2OTQyOV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTE4NDE5MDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Two corrupt cops in New Mexico set out to blackmail and frame every criminal unfortunate enough to cross their path. Things take a sinister turn, however, when they try to intimidate someone who is more dangerous than they are. Or is he?"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002907/","name":"Alexander Skarsgård"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0671567/","name":"Michael Peña"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3772243/","name":"Theo James"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567620/","name":"John Michael McDonagh"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0196210/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0037450/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0121295/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0567620/","name":"John Michael McDonagh"}],"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Greed
Greed
programme.desc: Greed: Directed by Michael Winterbottom. With Caroline Flack, Steve Coogan, David Mitchell, Isla Fisher. Satire about the world of the super-rich." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt8972256/","name":"Greed","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDUzZDc3ZGYtOWZmNi00ZWIyLWE3YTYtNjRmZWZhMDNmNjhhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTgxNDIzMTY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Satire about the world of the super-rich.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt8972256/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"mstone-1"},"dateCreated":"2019-10-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Enjoyable with some very good performances","reviewBody":"Having read the review from an attendee at the Toronto Film Festival I wasn't too hopeful, They said the audience didn't find it amusing but that certainly wasn't the case today at the London Film Festival. Perhaps it was a North American v UK humour issue but more likely the fact that the London audience was much better acquainted with the person around whom it was based.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":5894,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2020-02-21","keywords":"husband wife relationship,fashion industry,fashion show,flashback within a flashback within a flashback,greece","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3277897497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE3YTYwNTItZDYwNy00OTk5LTg4MGEtZjFhMDMxMzJmYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmE3YTYwNTItZDYwNy00OTk5LTg4MGEtZjFhMDMxMzJmYTM1XkEyXkFqcGdeQUlNRGJWaWRlb1RodW1ibmFpbFNlcnZpY2U@._V1_.jpg","description":"'Greed' tells the story of self-made British billionaire Sir Richard McCreadie (Steve Coogan), whose retail empire is in crisis. For 30 years he has ruled the world of retail fashion – bringing the high street to the catwalk and the catwalk to the high street – but after a damaging public inquiry, his image is tarnished. To save his reputation, he decides to bounce back with a highly publicized and extravagant party celebrating his 60th birthday on the Greek island of Mykonos. A satire on the grotesque inequality of wealth in the fashion industry, the film sees McCreadie’s rise and fall through the eyes of his biographer, Nick (David Mitchell).\r\n"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1102585/","name":"Caroline Flack"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0176869/","name":"Steve Coogan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0593267/","name":"David Mitchell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935863/","name":"Michael Winterbottom"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0197272/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103733/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0660299/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0935863/","name":"Michael Winterbottom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2366133/","name":"Sean Gray"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: RV
Die Chaoscamper
programme.desc: RV: Directed by Barry Sonnenfeld. With Robin Williams, Cheryl Hines, JoJo, Josh Hutcherson. Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0449089/","name":"RV","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDgxNDE2NDU3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzA2ODQzMQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bob Munro and his dysfunctional family rent an RV for a road trip to the Colorado Rockies, where they ultimately have to contend with a bizarre community of campers.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0449089/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"pfdoiron"},"dateCreated":"2006-06-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not great but good enough","reviewBody":"Robin Williams was on sedatives for most of this one, but I think he was trying hard to be the semi-happily married businessman has was casted to be. The kids were just a little over the top but accurate enough examples of their generation. There were great slapstick scenes and some decent toilet humor that owners and renters of RVs can relate to more than others. Avoiding the sweet as pie family was very funny. The way they destroyed the RV at every turn, made me think a little too much about how Robin was going to pay for it especially since he loses his job at the end, but wait!! the little Ben and jerry type owners save the day.\n\nThis one was definitely a renter quality not a lets go see a movie quality film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":58312,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2006-05-31","keywords":"road trip,vacation,family vacation,family business,homeschooling","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"RV","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1602552089","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTVlMjQ4ZjItMDBmZC00NzA4LWEyMGQtMzM3NGJiZWMxYWUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTVlMjQ4ZjItMDBmZC00NzA4LWEyMGQtMzM3NGJiZWMxYWUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0385644/","name":"Cheryl Hines"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0155693/","name":"Kristin Chenoweth"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001756/","name":"Barry Sonnenfeld"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010183/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0734900/","name":"Geoff Rodkey"}],"duration":"PT1H39M"}</script><metacontent="
